title: How much LP have I supposed to get per win?
body:
Hi guys,
I was just wondering how is the amount of LP that you gain per win calculated?
I just won a game, did pretty well and only got 13 LP.
Thanks.

replies.body: Im in bronze 3 and get 29 LP per win.

Its based on the MMR difference between teams. Your MMR is based on your TOTAL winrate for the season, so even if you win 5 games in a row, if you've lost 10 before that, you will not be making good gains.

The goal of the system is the try and get you to a 50% winrate, your goal is to keep your winrate above that so you can climb ratings.
You have a 48% winrate this season, so you won't be getting much LP until you get above the 50% mark again.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=truegolddigger

You can gain anywhere from about 8-32ish at a time. It doesn't matter how well you did individually it's only the win or the loss that matters. If you win more games in a row, or just have a consistently higher than 50% winrate the amount of LP you gain every match steadily goes up until you reach your correct MMR (Match Making Ranking).

If you're in the exact league you're supposed to be in for your skill level you'll gain and lose roughly 18LP at a time, if you're lower than you should be you'll gain more and lose less at a time and vice versa.

> There is only one factor that affects the amount of LP you get: the perceived difficulty of the match, which is based on the MMR difference between the two teams. Being part of a premade group, kill/death ratios, and other statistics do not affect your LP gain.
[Source](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h3q4)
